content: After pasting some code into my project, i got a bunch of red-squiggles from rust-analyzer. for most of them, I used quick-fix to automatically import the right types, but one of the red-squiggles remained. after a little thinking, I realized that a package in my Cargo.toml needed to be updated to a newer version. So I did that, saved the file, and then tried quick-fix again. After waiting about 5 seconds, rust-analzyer came back with the right answer and let me auto-import the right trait.
this is a pretty simple workflow, but i know it took a lot of hard-work to get here and to make the experience this seamless
